title: Style login role dropdown/select options with yellow background

requirements.text: In the Login page (frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx), ensure the SELECT SYSTEM ROLE dropdown's option elements are styled with a yellow (#FFD700) background and black text, so that the options list visually matches the yellow/gold theme already applied to other interactive form elements on the page.

quotes: change login option in yellow colour

acceptanceCriteria: The SELECT SYSTEM ROLE dropdown's visible option items (Administrator, Librarian, Faculty Member, Student Representative, and the placeholder 'Identify your role') display with a #FFD700 yellow background and black text when the dropdown is open.
The closed/selected state of the dropdown also shows yellow background with black text, consistent with other form inputs on the Login page.
No other styling on the Login page is altered by this change.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Only change the Login page role dropdown option styling; do not alter any other page or component.
nonGoals: Changing the layout or structure of the Login page.
Restyling any page other than LoginPage.tsx.
